name=''Risk: The Lord of the Rings: Gondor & Mordor Expansion Set''

column1: '''''Risk: The Lord of the Rings: Gondor & Mordor''''' is an expansion set for ''[[Risk: The Lord of the Rings: The Middle-earth Conquest Game]]'', published in [[2003]] by Hasbro. It serves as merchandise to [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)

Only playable with the 'Lord Of The Rings Risk' main game. Also included is a 2 player bonus game designed by Richard Borg, which allows you to re-enact the siege of Minas Tirith. This 'The Lord Of The Rings Risk' expansion set completes the map of Middle-earth with the Gondor, Mordor and Haradwaith Territories. Including a pewter replica of the one ring, an extra game board and new Territory cards and figures, the scene is set for you to take control once and for all.
*''[[Risk: The Lord of the Rings: The Middle-earth Conquest Game]]''
*''[[Risk: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Edition]]''
* [http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/8504/risk-lord-of-the-rings-expansion-set-incl-siege-o Risk: Lord of the Rings Expansion Set] at [http://boardgamegeek.com/ BoardGameGeek]
